data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Forrester, Juanita A., Vandenberg, Natalia J., Mchugh, Joseph V. (2009): Redescription of Anovia circumclusa (Gorham) (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Noviini), with first description of the egg, larva, and pupa, and notes on adult intraspecific elytral pattern variation. Zootaxa 2112: 25-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187887
